meanings.definition: Sitting or lying down with the body upright.
meanings.sent1: The sejeant cat looked comfortable on the couch.
meanings.sent2: The sejeant dog enjoyed the sunny spot by the window.
meanings.sent3: The sejeant rabbit seemed to be practicing yoga.
meanings.sent4: The sejeant tree appeared to be reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The sejeant child sat up straight in class.

meanings.definition: A heraldic term describing an animal depicted in profile with its forepaws raised.
meanings.sent1: The sejeant lion on the family crest looked fierce.
meanings.sent2: The sejeant bear on the flag symbolized strength.
meanings.sent3: The sejeant squirrel on the logo seemed ready to dance.
meanings.sent4: The sejeant dragon on the banner seemed to guard the castle.
meanings.sent5: The sejeant eagle on the shield looked majestic.
